LanguageData.EM_ButcherCorpseMechanoid.label: butcher mechanoid
LanguageData.EM_ButcherCorpseMechanoid.description: Pull apart a blood machine and recover its tough, pliable skin.
LanguageData.EM_DigDirtMulti.label: mass excavate dirt
LanguageData.EM_DigDirtMulti.description: Collect large amounts of soil and detritus that likely contain valuable resources in the form of forgotten machinery.
LanguageData.EM_DigDirtSingle.label: excavate dirt
LanguageData.EM_DigDirtSingle.description: Collect piles of soil and detritus that likely contain valuable resources in the form of forgotten machinery.
LanguageData.EM_MechC.label: combine small mechanisms
LanguageData.EM_MechC.description: Combine several small mechanisms to create a larger mechanism.
LanguageData.EM_MechCL.label: disassemble large mechanisms
LanguageData.EM_MechCL.description: Disassemble a large mechanism into several smaller mechanisms.
LanguageData.EM_MechL.label: assemble large mechanism
LanguageData.EM_MechL.description: Sort through piles of dirt laced with broken machinery and lost fragments of technology to assemble a large mechanism.
LanguageData.EM_MechS.label: assemble small mechanism
LanguageData.EM_MechS.description: Sort through piles of dirt laced with broken machinery and lost fragments of technology to assemble a small mechanism.
